summary.span: 表示 中的列的架构。

span.span: Represents the schema of a column in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用于创建的架构的基本构建块。The is the fundamental building block for creating the schema of a . 通过添加一个或多个生成架构对象添加到。You build the schema by adding one or more objects to the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[向数据表添加列](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable.md)。For more information, see [Adding Columns to a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable.md). 每个已属性，用于确定的数据类型包含。Each has a property that determines the kind of data the contains. 例如，您可以限制的数据类型为整数或字符串或小数位数。For example, you can restrict the data type to integers, or strings, or decimals. 因为由包含数据的通常合并回其原始的数据源，必须匹配到数据源中的数据类型。Because data that is contained by the is typically merged back into its original data source, you must match the data types to those in the data source. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ADO.NET 中的数据类型映射](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-type-mappings-in-ado-net.md)。For more information, see [Data Type Mappings in ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-type-mappings-in-ado-net.md). 属性，如， ，和施加的输入和更新数据，从而有助于保证数据完整性的限制。Properties such as , , and put restrictions on the entry and updating of data, thereby helping to guarantee data integrity. 此外可以使用， ，和属性来控制数据自动生成。You can also use the , , and properties to control automatic data generation. 有关详细信息列，请参阅[创建 AutoIncrement 列](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-autoincrement-columns.md)。For more information about columns, see [Creating AutoIncrement Columns](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-autoincrement-columns.md). 有关详细信息，请参阅[定义主键](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md). 此外需确保中的值都是唯一的创建并将其添加到的到所属。You can also make sure that values in a are unique by creating a and adding it to the of the to which the belongs. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据表约束](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints.md)。For more information, see [DataTable Constraints](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints.md). 若要创建之间的关系对象创建对象，并将其添加到的。To create a relation between objects, create a object and add it to the of a . 可以使用属性的要计算的列中值的对象或创建聚合列。You can use the property of the object to calculate the values in a column, or create an aggregate column. 有关详细信息，请参阅[创建表达式列](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-expression-columns.md)。For more information, see [Creating Expression Columns](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-expression-columns.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建与多个对象。The following example creates a with several objects. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 你必须同步的任何写入操作。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `type`自变量集属性。The `type` argument sets the property. 该属性指定如何时映射转换为 XML 文档。The property specifies how a is mapped when a is transformed into an XML document. 例如，如果列名为"fName"和所包含的值是"Bob，"并`type`设置为`MappingType.Attribute`，XML 元素会按如下所示：For example, if the column is named "fName," and the value it contains is "Bob," and `type` is set to `MappingType.Attribute`, the XML element would be as follows: \<名称 fName = Bob / >\ 有关如何将列映射到元素或属性的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information about how columns are mapped to elements or attributes, see the property. ## Examples 下面的示例构造一个计算的列。The following example constructs a computed column. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumn.DataColumn4 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.DataColumn4 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumn.DataColumn4 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.DataColumn4 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoIncrement { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoIncrement : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对于添加到该表中的新行，列是否将列的值自动递增。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the column automatically increments the value of the column for new rows added to the table.

value.span: 如果列的值自动递增，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the column increments automatically; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此列的类型不是 Int16、 Int32 或 Int64 时设置此属性，属性强制为 Int32。If the type of this column is not Int16, Int32, or Int64 when this property is set, the property is coerced to Int32. 如果这是一个计算的列生成异常。An exception is generated if this is a computed column. 属性设置。The property is set. 本专栏中，当添加到列集合的行的值等于默认值时，才使用递增的值。The incremented value is used only if the row's value for this column, when added to the columns collection, is equal to the default value. 您可以创建新行使用属性的类，并传入值的数组。You can create a new row using the property of the class and passing in an array of values. 这是具有的列的潜在问题及其设置为`true`，因为其值自动生成。This is a potential problem for a column with its set to `true`, because its value is generated automatically. 若要使用属性中，位置`null`在数组中的列的位置。To use the property, place `null` in the column's position in the array. 有关详细信息，请参阅属性的类。For more information, see the property of the class. 如果列的类型为或，不起作用。If the type of the column is or , will not work. 请改用 Int16 或 Int32。Use Int16 or Int32 instead. 如果列的类型为或，将仅部分工作。If the type of the column is or , will only partially work. 改为使用 Int64 或小数。Use Int64 or Decimal instead. 当值添加到当前的值中，将取消溢出检查。When the value is added to the current value, the overflow check is suppressed. ## Examples 下面的示例设置， ，和属性。The following example sets the , , and properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定如何时映射另存为 XML 文档使用方法。The property determines how a is mapped when a is saved as an XML document using the method. 例如，如果名为"customerID，"并将其属性设置为`MappingType.Element`，该列的值将生成以下 XML:For example, if a is named "customerID," and its property is set to `MappingType.Element`, the column value will produce the following XML: ``` ALFKI ...... 12345 ALFKI ...... ``` 但是，如果相同的列映射到`MappingType.Attribute`，生成的以下 XML:However, if the same column is mapped to `MappingType.Attribute`, the following XML is produced: ``` ...... More orders for this customer ``` 使用构造函数，包含`type`参数指定如何当映射其转换为 XML 文档。Use the constructor that contains the `type` argument to specificy how the is mapped when its is transformed to an XML document. 属性对应于构造函数参数`type`。The property corresponds to the constructor argument `type`. ## Examples 下面的示例设置新类型的属性。The following example sets the type property of new . value.span: 一个 对象，它表示列数据类型。

span.span: A object that represents the column data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置值是确保正确创建和更新数据源中的数据非常重要。Setting the value is very important to guaranteeing the correct creation and updating of data in a data source. 属性支持以下基本的.NET Framework 数据类型：The property supports the following base .NET Framework data types: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 以及以下数组类型：as well as the following array type: - `Byte[]` 在列之后更改此属性存储的数据已开始时则会生成异常。An exception is generated when changing this property after the column has begun storing data. 如果设置为`true`之前设置属性，并且尝试将类型设置为所有非整数类型，则会生成异常。If is set to `true` before setting the property, and you try to set the type to anything except an integer type, an exception is generated. > [!NOTE] > 数据类型的列的`Byte[]`需要特殊处理方式，在某些情况下，因为与不同的是基本的.NET Framework 数据类型，它是引用数据类型。A column of data type `Byte[]` requires special treatment in certain cases since, unlike the base .NET Framework data types, it is a reference data type. 如果数据类型的列`Byte[]`用作，或被或密钥对，对列的值的任何更改都必须包括将`Byte[]`单独实例化到列的值`Byte[]`对象。If a column of data type `Byte[]` is used as a , or as a or key for a , any change to the column value must involve assigning the `Byte[]` column value to a separately instantiated `Byte[]` object. 此分配需要触发的排序、 筛选和主要密钥操作使用的内部索引更新。This assignment is required to trigger the update of the internal indexes used by sorting, filtering, and primary key operations. 下面的示例对此进行演示：This is illustrated by the following example: ```csharp byte[] columnValue = (byte[])myDataTable.Rows[0][0]; byte[] newValue = (byte[])columnValue.Clone(); newValue[1] = 2; myDataTable.Rows[0][0] = newValue; ``` > [!NOTE] > 尽管可以将列定义为数据类型不是基本的.NET Framework 数据类型，但和`Byte[]`，这样的列将视为用户定义类型，有以下使用情况限制。Although it is possible to define a column as data type other than the base .NET Framework data types and `Byte[]`, such a column will be treated as a user-defined type, subject to the following usage restrictions. (用户定义类型的详细信息，请参阅[创建和使用用户定义类型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ec0266d2-7e5b-47e4-938a-85ac9d04fa40)。)(For more information on user-defined types, see [Creating and Using User-Defined Types](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ec0266d2-7e5b-47e4-938a-85ac9d04fa40).) - 列不能属于或表达式。The column cannot be part of a or expression. - 如果列用作，或作为或，必须将视为不可变字段; 添加到表后，不得更改列数据。If the column is used as a , or as a or for a , it must be treated as an immutable field; the column data must not be changed once it has been added to the table. - 其可以仅设置为`MappingType.Element`。Its can be only set to `MappingType.Element`. - 必须使用标记列的数据类型必须的实现的类，并且如果需要实现或接口。The class that implements the column’s data type must be must be marked with the , and if necessary implement the or interface. - 更改跟踪的支持是有限的。Support for change tracking is limited. 若要利用类的更改跟踪机制，实现列的数据类型的类必须实现接口，或者接管负责通知在该列的值时修改，或者通过调用在该行上或通过将列的值对象分配给单独实例化的列的值对象。To utilize the class’s change tracking mechanism, the class that implements the column’s data type must either implement the interface, or take over the responsibility for informing the when the column value has been modified, either by calling on the row or by assigning the column value object to a separately instantiated column value object. ## Examples 以下示例将添加到多个数据类型的列，然后将一行添加到表。The following example adds columns of several data types to a , and then adds one row to the table. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumn.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.DataType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumn.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.DataType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 列已经存储了数据。

span.span: The column already has data stored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::DataSetDateTime DateTimeMode { System::Data::DataSetDateTime get(); void set(System::Data::DataSetDateTime value); };
member this.DateTimeMode : System.Data.DataSetDateTime with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置列的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the for the column.
The for the specified column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后的行添加到不能修改，除了从修改和，反之亦然。The cannot be modified after rows are added to a , except for modifying from and or vice-versa. 从修改`UnspecifiedLocal`到`Unspecified`和允许进行相反的转换，因为这两个选项之间的区别是仅在序列化期间，不会影响存储。The modification from `UnspecifiedLocal` to `Unspecified` and vice-versa is allowed as the difference between these two options is only during serialization and does not affect the storage.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ DefaultValue { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.DefaultValue : obj with get, set

summary.span: 在创建新行时获取或设置列的默认值。

span.span: Gets or sets the default value for the column when you are creating new rows.
A value appropriate to the column's .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值是自动分配给列的值时创建 (例如，日期和时间已创建。A default value is the value that is automatically assigned to the column when a is created (for example, the date and time when the was created. 当设置为 true，可以有没有默认值。When is set to true, there can be no default value. 您可以创建新行使用属性的类并将该方法传递值的数组。You can create a new row using the property of the class and passing the method an array of values. 这是默认值的列的潜在问题，因为其值自动生成。This is a potential problem for a column with a default value because its value is generated automatically. 若要使用属性对这样的列，将放置`null`在数组中的列的位置。To use the property with such a column, place `null` in the column's position in the array. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的多个的对象具有不同的数据类型，并设置相应默认值为每个列。The following example creates several objects that have different data types, and sets appropriate default values to each column. [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumn.DefaultValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.DefaultValue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 在添加行时，默认值不是列的数据类型的实例。

span.span: When you are adding a row, the default value is not an instance of the column's data type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Expression { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Expression : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表达式，用于筛选行、计算列中的值或创建聚合列。

span.span: Gets or sets the expression used to filter rows, calculate the values in a column, or create an aggregate column.

value.span: 用来计算列的值，或创建聚合列的表达式。

span.span: An expression to calculate the value of a column, or create an aggregate column.

value.span: 表达式的返回类型由列的 来确定。

span.span: The return type of an expression is determined by the of the column.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 一种用途属性是创建计算的列。One use of the property is to create calculated columns. 例如，若要计算税金值，单位价格相乘的特定区域的税率。For example, to calculate a tax value, the unit price is multiplied by a tax rate of a specific region. 因为税率不同区域之间，它就不可能将单一税率放在列;相反，使用计算值属性，如以下部分中的 Visual Basic 代码中所示：Because tax rates vary from region to region, it would be impossible to put a single tax rate in a column; instead, the value is calculated using the property, as shown in the Visual Basic code in the following section: DataSet1.Tables("Products").Columns("tax").Expression = "UnitPrice \* 0.086"DataSet1.Tables("Products").Columns("tax").Expression = "UnitPrice \* 0.086" 第二个用途是创建聚合列。A second use is to create an aggregate column. 类似于计算得出的值，聚合执行操作中的行的完整集上基于。Similar to a calculated value, an aggregate performs an operation based on the complete set of rows in the . 一个简单的示例是在集中返回的行数进行计数。A simple example is to count the number of rows returned in the set. 这是想要用于计算的特定销售人员所完成的事务数，此 Visual Basic 代码中所示的方法：This is the method you would use to count the number of transactions completed by a particular salesperson, as shown in this Visual Basic code: ```vb DataSet1.Tables("Orders").Columns("OrderCount").Expression = "Count(OrderID)" ``` ## 表达式语法Expression Syntax 创建一个表达式，请使用属性来引用的列。When you create an expression, use the property to refer to columns. 例如，如果一列是"UnitPrice"和另一个"Quantity"，将对该表达式，如下所示：For example, if the for one column is "UnitPrice", and another "Quantity", the expression would be as follows: "UnitPrice \* Quantity""UnitPrice \* Quantity" > [!NOTE] > 如果在表达式中使用某列，然后表达式则称对该列中具有依赖关系。If a column is used in an expression, then the expression is said to have a dependency on that column. 如果重命名或删除依赖列，不引发异常。If a dependent column is renamed or removed, no exception is thrown. 缺少了依赖表达式列受访问时，将引发异常。An exception will be thrown when the now-broken expression column is accessed. 创建筛选器的表达式时，将字符串用单引号引起来：When you create an expression for a filter, enclose strings with single quotation marks: "LastName = 'Jones'""LastName = 'Jones'" 如果列名称包含任何非字母数字字符或数字开头 （不区分大小写） 与匹配任何以下保留字，则需要特殊处理，如以下各段中所述。If a column name contains any non-alphanumeric characters or starts with a digit or matches (case-insensitively) any of the following reserved words, it requires special handling, as described in the following paragraphs. AndAnd 之间Between 子级Child FalseFalse 内In 是Is LikeLike NotNot nullNull OrOr 父级Parent TrueTrue 如果列名称满足上述条件之一，它必须括在方括号或""（重音符） 引号引起来。If a column name satisfies one of the above conditions, it must be wrapped in either square brackets or the "\`" (grave accent) quotes. 例如，若要使用名为"列 #"在表达式中的列，您应编写任一"[列 #]":For example, to use a column named "Column#" in an expression, you would write either "[Column#]": 总 \* [列 #]Total \* [Column#] 或"\`列 #'":or "\`Column#`": 总 \*\`列 #Total \* \`Column#\` 如果列名称括在方括号中然后任何] 和\\必须通过预先计算其反斜杠转义字符 （但没有任何其他字符），在它 ("\\") 字符。If the column name is enclosed in square brackets then any ']' and '\\' characters (but not any other characters) in it must be escaped by prepending them with the backslash ("\\") character. 如果列名称括在重音字符然后必须不包含在其中任何重音符字符。If the column name is enclosed in grave accent characters then it must not contain any grave accent characters in it. 例如，一个名为的列"列 []\\"，则会写入：For example, a column named "Column[]\\" would be written: 总 \* [列 [\\]\\\\]Total \* [Column[\\]\\\\] 或or 总 \*\`列]\\`Total \* \`Column[]\\` ## 用户定义的值User-Defined Values 要与列的值进行比较，可能在表达式中使用用户定义的值。User-defined values may be used within expressions to be compared with column values. 字符串值应括在单引号 （和字符串值中的每个单引号字符已由另一个单引号字符前面添加转义）。String values should be enclosed within single quotation marks (and each single quotation character in a string value has to be escaped by prepending it with another single quotation character). 日期值应括在井号 （#） 或单引号 （'） 基于的数据提供程序。Date values should be enclosed within pound signs (#) or single quotes (') based on the data provider. 小数位数和科学记数法是允许用于数字值。Decimals and scientific notation are permissible for numeric values. 例如:For example: "FirstName = 'John'""FirstName = 'John'" "价格 < = 50.00""Price <= 50.00" "出生日期 < #1/31/82 #""Birthdate < #1/31/82#" 对于包含枚举值的列，将值转换为整数数据类型。For columns that contain enumeration values, cast the value to an integer data type. 例如:For example: "EnumColumn = 5""EnumColumn = 5" ## 分析文本表达式Parsing Literal Expressions 所有文本表达式必须以固定的区域。All literal expressions must be expressed in the invariant culture locale. 当`DataSet`分析并转换文本表达式时，它始终使用固定区域性，而不是当前区域性。When `DataSet` parses and converts literal expressions, it always uses the invariant culture, not the current culture. 用单引号引起值时，标识字符串文本。String literals are identified when there are single quotes surrounding the value. 例如:For example: John'John' `Boolean` 文本为 true 和 false;在表达式中，它们是不带引号。`Boolean` literals are true and false; they are not quoted in expressions. `Integer` 文本 [+-]？[0-9] + 被视为`System.Int32`，`System.Int64`或`System.Double`。`Integer` literals [+-]?[0-9]+ are treated as `System.Int32`, `System.Int64` or `System.Double`. `System.Double` 可能会丢失精度，具体取决于数是多少。`System.Double` can lose precision depending on how large the number is. 例如，如果在文本中的号码是 2147483650，`DataSet`将首先尝试将数字作为解析`Int32`。For example, if the number in the literal is 2147483650, `DataSet` will first attempt to parse the number as an `Int32`. 由于数太大，这种情况将不会成功。This will not succeed because the number is too large. 在这种情况下`DataSet`将分析将数字显示为`Int64`，这将会成功。In this case `DataSet` will parse the number as an `Int64`, which will succeed. 如果文本的 Int64，大于最大值的数字`DataSet`将分析文本使用`Double`。If the literal was a number larger than the maximum value of an Int64, `DataSet` will parse the literal using `Double`. 使用科学记数法，例如 4.42372 e 的实际文本-30，进行分析使用`System.Double`。Real literals using scientific notation, such as 4.42372E-30, are parsed using `System.Double`. 科学记数法，而不带小数点，实际文字将视为`System.Decimal`。Real literals without scientific notation, but with a decimal point, are treated as `System.Decimal`. 如果数超过了支持的最大或最小值`System.Decimal`，然后将它分析为`System.Double`。If the number exceeds the maximum or minimum values supported by `System.Decimal`, then it is parsed as a `System.Double`. 例如:For example: 142526.144524 将转换为`Decimal`。142526.144524 will be converted to a `Decimal`. 345262.78036719560925667 将被视为`Double`。345262.78036719560925667 will be treated as a `Double`. ## 运算符Operators 串联被允许使用布尔 AND、 OR 和 NOT 运算符。Concatenation is allowed using Boolean AND, OR, and NOT operators. 可以使用括号对子句进行分组，并强制执行优先顺序。You can use parentheses to group clauses and force precedence. AND 运算符的优先级高于其他运算符。The AND operator has precedence over other operators. 例如:For example: (LastName = Smith 或姓氏 = Jones)和名字 = John(LastName = 'Smith' OR LastName = 'Jones') AND FirstName = 'John' 在创建比较表达式时，允许使用以下运算符：When you create comparison expressions, the following operators are allowed: \< > \<= >= <> = ININ LIKELIKE 在表达式中还支持下列算术运算符：The following arithmetic operators are also supported in expressions: \+ （加法）\+ (addition) \-（减号）\- (subtraction) \* （乘法）\* (multiplication) / （除）/ (division) %（取模）% (modulus) ## 字符串运算符String Operators 若要连接字符串，使用 + 字符。To concatenate a string, use the + character. 值属性的类确定字符串比较是否区分大小写。The value of the property of the class determines whether string comparisons are case-sensitive. 但是，您可以覆盖该值与属性的类。However, you can override that value with the property of the class. ## 通配符Wildcard Characters 同时 \* 和 %可以互换使用 LIKE 比较中的通配符字符。Both the \* and % can be used interchangeably for wildcard characters in a LIKE comparison. 如果 LIKE 子句中的字符串包含 \* 或 %，这些字符应括在方括号 ([])。If the string in a LIKE clause contains a \* or %, those characters should be enclosed in brackets ([]). 如果子句中有一个方括号，每个大括号字符应括在括号中 （例如 [[] 或 []]）。If a bracket is in the clause, each bracket character should be enclosed in brackets (for example [[] or []]). 在开始和结束的一种模式，或末尾的一种模式，或在模式的起始位置，都允许使用通配符。A wildcard is allowed at the start and end of a pattern, or at the end of a pattern, or at the start of a pattern. 例如:For example: "项目名称如 * 产品\*'""ItemName LIKE '*product\*'" "项目名称如 \* 产品 '""ItemName LIKE '\*product'" "ItemName LIKE ' 产品 \*'""ItemName LIKE 'product\*'" 字符串中间不允许使用通配符字符。Wildcard characters are not allowed in the middle of a string. 例如，te \* xt 不允许。For example, 'te\*xt' is not allowed. ## 引用的父/子关系Parent/Child Relation Referencing 可能会通过预先计算的列名在表达式中引用父表`Parent`。A parent table may be referenced in an expression by prepending the column name with `Parent`. 例如，`Parent.Price`引用名为父表的列`Price`。For example, the `Parent.Price` references the parent table's column named `Price`. 当子补偿有多个父行时，使用 Parent(RelationName)。列名称。When a child has more than one parent row, use Parent(RelationName).ColumnName. 例如，Parent(RelationName)。价格引用关系通过名为 Price 的父表的列。For example, the Parent(RelationName).Price references the parent table’s column named Price via the relation. 可能会通过预先计算的列名在表达式中引用子表中的列`Child`。A column in a child table may be referenced in an expression by prepending the column name with `Child`. 但是，因为子关系可能会返回多个行，您必须在聚合函数包含对子列的引用。However, because child relationships may return multiple rows, you must include the reference to the child column in an aggregate function. 例如，`Sum(Child.Price)`将返回名为的列的总和`Price`子表中。For example, `Sum(Child.Price)` would return the sum of the column named `Price` in the child table. 如果表具有多个子级，则语法是： `Child(RelationName)`。If a table has more than one child, the syntax is: `Child(RelationName)`. 例如，如果表具有两个名为的子表`Customers`和`Orders`，并对象被命名为`Customers2Orders`，则引用将按如下所示：For example, if a table has two child tables named `Customers` and `Orders`, and the object is named `Customers2Orders`, the reference would be as follows: Avg(Child(Customers2Orders).Quantity)Avg(Child(Customers2Orders).Quantity) ## 聚合Aggregates 支持以下聚合类型：The following aggregate types are supported: Sum (Sum)Sum (Sum) Avg （平均）Avg (Average) 最小值 （最小值）Min (Minimum) 最大值 （最大值）Max (Maximum) 计数 （计数）Count (Count) StDev （统计标准偏差）StDev (Statistical standard deviation) Var （统计方差）。Var (Statistical variance). 沿着关系通常执行聚合。Aggregates are ordinarily performed along relationships. 父/子关系引用前面讨论的中所述使用上面列出的函数和子表列之一创建的聚合表达式。Create an aggregate expression by using one of the functions listed earlier and a child table column as detailed in Parent/Child Relation Referencing that was discussed earlier. 例如:For example: Avg(Child.Price)Avg(Child.Price) Avg(Child(Orders2Details).Price)Avg(Child(Orders2Details).Price) 此外可以对单个表执行聚合。An aggregate can also be performed on a single table. 例如，若要在列中创建的图形摘要名为"Price":For example, to create a summary of figures in a column named "Price": Sum(Price)Sum(Price) > [!NOTE] > 如果使用单个表来创建聚合，会有任何组的功能。If you use a single table to create an aggregate, there would be no group-by functionality. 相反，所有行将列中都显示相同的值。Instead, all rows would display the same value in the column. 如果表具有任何行，则聚合函数将返回`null`。If a table has no rows, the aggregate functions will return `null`. 数据类型可始终通过检查来确定列属性。Data types can always be determined by examining the property of a column. 此外可以将转换数据类型使用 Convert 函数，以下部分中所示。You can also convert data types using the Convert function, shown in the following section. 聚合只能应用于单个列，也可以在聚合内部使用任何其他表达式。An aggregate can only be applied to a single column and no other expressions can be used inside the aggregate. ## 函数Functions 此外支持以下函数：The following functions are also supported: `CONVERT` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|将特定的表达式转换为指定的.NET Framework 类型。Converts particular expression to a specified .NET Framework Type.| |语法Syntax|转换 (`expression`， `type`)Convert(`expression`, `type`)| |自变量Arguments|`expression` --在要转换的表达式。`expression` -- The expression to convert.

`type` --值将转换成在.NET Framework 类型。`type` -- The .NET Framework type to which the value will be converted.| Example: myDataColumn.Expression="Convert(total, 'System.Int32')"Example: myDataColumn.Expression="Convert(total, 'System.Int32')" 所有转换都是有效但存在以下例外：`Boolean`与可强制转换`Byte`， `SByte`， `Int16`， `Int32`， `Int64`， `UInt16`， `UInt32`， `UInt64`， `String`和其本身。All conversions are valid with the following exceptions: `Boolean` can be coerced to and from `Byte`, `SByte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `UInt16`, `UInt32`, `UInt64`, `String` and itself only. `Char` 与可强制转换`Int32`， `UInt32`， `String`，和其本身。`Char` can be coerced to and from `Int32`, `UInt32`, `String`, and itself only. `DateTime` 可强制转换和`String`和其本身。`DateTime` can be coerced to and from `String` and itself only. `TimeSpan` 可强制转换和`String`和其本身。`TimeSpan` can be coerced to and from `String` and itself only. `LEN` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|获取一个字符串的长度Gets the length of a string| |语法Syntax|LEN (`expression`)LEN(`expression`)| |自变量Arguments|`expression` --要计算的字符串。`expression` -- The string to be evaluated.| Example: myDataColumn.Expression="Len(ItemName)"Example: myDataColumn.Expression="Len(ItemName)" `ISNULL` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|检查表达式并返回已检查的表达式，或者替换值。Checks an expression and either returns the checked expression or a replacement value.| |语法Syntax|ISNULL (`expression`， `replacementvalue`)ISNULL(`expression`, `replacementvalue`)| |自变量Arguments|`expression` --若要检查的表达式。`expression` -- The expression to check.

`replacementvalue` --如果表达式是`null`，`replacementvalue`返回。`replacementvalue` -- If expression is `null`, `replacementvalue` is returned.| Example: myDataColumn.Expression="IsNull(price, -1)"Example: myDataColumn.Expression="IsNull(price, -1)" `IIF` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|获取具体取决于逻辑表达式的结果的两个值之一。Gets one of two values depending on the result of a logical expression.| |语法Syntax|IIF (`expr`， `truepart`， `falsepart`)IIF(`expr`, `truepart`, `falsepart`)| |自变量Arguments|`expr` --要计算的表达式。`expr` -- The expression to evaluate.

`truepart` --若要在表达式为 true 时返回的值。`truepart` -- The value to return if the expression is true.

`falsepart` --在表达式为 false 时返回的值。`falsepart` -- The value to return if the expression is false.| Example: myDataColumn.Expression = "IIF(total>1000, 'expensive', 'dear')Example: myDataColumn.Expression = "IIF(total>1000, 'expensive', 'dear') `TRIM` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|删除所有前导空格和尾随空白字符，如 \r、 \n、 \t，Removes all leading and trailing blank characters like \r, \n, \t, ' '| |语法Syntax|剪裁 (`expression`)TRIM(`expression`)| |自变量Arguments|`expression` --在要剪裁的表达式。`expression` -- The expression to trim.| `SUBSTRING` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|获取指定的长度，从字符串中指定位置开始的子字符串。Gets a sub-string of a specified length, starting at a specified point in the string.| |语法Syntax|子字符串 (`expression`， `start`， `length`)SUBSTRING(`expression`, `start`, `length`)| |自变量Arguments|`expression` --源字符串的子字符串。`expression` -- The source string for the substring.

`start` -指定子字符串的开始位置的整数。`start` -- Integer that specifies where the substring starts.

`length` -指定子字符串的长度的整数。`length` -- Integer that specifies the length of the substring.| 示例： myDataColumn.Expression ="子字符串 (phone，7，8)"Example: myDataColumn.Expression = "SUBSTRING(phone, 7, 8)" > [!NOTE] > 你可以重置属性通过将其分配一个 null 值或空字符串。You can reset the property by assigning it a null value or empty string. 表达式列设置为默认值，如果以前已填充的所有行都分配的默认值为之后属性重置。If a default value is set on the expression column, all previously filled rows are assigned the default value after the property is reset. ## Examples 下面的示例创建三个列中的。The following example creates three columns in a . 第二个和第三个列包含表达式;第二个计算税使用变量的税率，并第三个将计算的结果添加到第一列的值。The second and third columns contain expressions; the second calculates tax using a variable tax rate, and the third adds the result of the calculation to the value of the first column. 生成的表显示在控件。The resulting table is displayed in a control. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumn.Expression Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.Expression Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumn.Expression Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.Expression Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取与 相关的自定义用户信息的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of custom user information associated with a .
A of custom information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，可以存储与对象的自定义信息。The property lets you store custom information with the object. 例如，可以存储刷新数据的时间。For example, you may store a time when the data should be refreshed. 扩展的属性必须为类型。Extended properties must be of type . 属性的类型不是时不会保留以 XML 形式写入。Properties that are not of type are not persisted when the is written as XML. ## Examples 以下示例将添加到自定义属性返回的属性。The following example adds a custom property to the returned by the property. 第二个示例检索自定义属性。The second example retrieves the custom property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 会忽略非文本列的属性。The property is ignored for non-text columns. 一个会引发异常，如果将分配到非字符串列。A exception is raised if you assign to a non-string column.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace of the .
The namespace of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性时读取和写入 XML 文档为使用中使用， ， ，或方法。The property is used when reading and writing an XML document into a in the using the , , , or methods. XML 文档的命名空间用于确定范围的 XML 属性和元素时读取到。The namespace of an XML document is used to scope XML attributes and elements when read into a . 例如，包含一个架构从文档中读取具有命名空间"myCompany，"并尝试读取数据 (与方法) 从文档中包含的命名空间"theirCompany。"For example, a contains a schema read from a document that has the namespace "myCompany," and an attempt is made to read data (with the method) from a document that has the namespace "theirCompany." 与现有架构不对应的任何数据将被忽略。Any data that does not correspond to the existing schema will be ignored.

exception.span: 该命名空间已有数据。

span.span: The namespace already has data.

summary.span: 将 的序号或位置更改为指定的序号或位置。

span.span: Changes the ordinal or position of the to the specified ordinal or position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 的序号或位置更改为指定的序号或位置。Changes the ordinal or position of the to the specified ordinal or position. 如果序号为小于 0 或大于的现有列 – 1 （大于最后一列的序号） 数则无效引发。If ordinal is less than 0 or greater than the existing number of columns – 1 (greater than the ordinal of the last column) then an Invalid is thrown. 当您更改列的序号时，请将列移动到的列的集合中的新位置。When you change a column’s ordinal, the column is moved to the new position in the collection of columns. 以前的和新序号之间的任何列将会重新编号，以进行调整的新列的序号。Any columns between the previous and new ordinal will be renumbered, to adjust for a column's new ordinal.
